oai_dc:dc.dc:title: United Confederate Veterans reunion souvenir medal
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This United Confederate Veterans reunion souvenir medal belonged to Pvt. Lewis Cole, Co. B, 55th Tenn. (Brown's) Inf., CSA. The U.C.V. reunion was in Nashville, Tenn. on June 14-16, 1904. The front of medal has the Confederate battle flag and the years; 1861 and 1865. The reverse side has the mark of B. H. Steif Jewelry Co. Nashville, Tenn. Cole was born in 1836 in Benton County, Tenn. and died in 1925 in Paris, Tenn.
